name: LZMA Compressed File
summary: Learn about .LZMA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open and view .LZMA files with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Some LZMA compressed files can be opened with StuffIt Expander or 7-Zip (Windows) and 7zX (Mac). Other LZMA files may require the LZMA SDK for Windows or LZMA Utils for Unix.
The LZMA Software Development Kit (SDK) is available from the 7-Zip website.

description: A file with .lzma extension is a compressed archive file created using the LZMA (Lempel-Ziv-Markov chain Algorithm) compression method. These are mainly found/used on Unix operating system and are similar to other compression algorithms such as ZIP for minimising file size. LZMA is a legacy file format, which is being or has been replaced by the .xz format. The MIME type of the .lzma format is `application/x-lzmaâ€™. This file format was designed by Igor Pavlov for use in LZMA SDK.

File or files compressed with LZMA (Lempel-Ziv-Markov chain Algorithm) compression; used by 7-Zip and other file archivers; known for having better compression ratios than bzip2 (.BZ2 files) and faster decompression.
